description:
The investment seeks to track the investment results (before fees and expenses) of the S&P 100® Equal Weight Index (the "underlying index").
 The fund generally will invest at least 90% of its total assets in the securities that comprise the underlying index. The underlying index is an equal weighted version of the S&P 100® Index, which is a capitalization weighted index comprised of a subset of 100 companies of the S&P 500® Index selected by S&P DJI and representing the largest and most stable companies in the S&P 500® Index. The fund is non-diversified.
